R3_recipe.title: Vegetable Fried Rice
R3_recipe.description: A simple and flavorful vegetable fried rice recipe made with eggs, mixed vegetables, butter, and soy sauce — perfect for a quick, homemade meal.

steps.title: Get Your Ingredients
details: Gather all ingredients: 1 1/2 cups uncooked rice, 2 eggs, 1/2 carrot, 1/2 green pepper, 6 mushrooms, 3 green onions, 1/2 zucchini, 2 tablespoons butter, 1/4 cup soy sauce, and 2 to 3 cups water.

steps.title: Prepare Your Rice and Vegetables
details: Cook 1 1/2 cups rice according to package instructions using 2–3 cups water depending on rice type.
Bring water to a boil, add rice, stir for 30 seconds, remove from heat, and cover with lid until cooked.
Tip: Use a rice cooker for easier cooking.
Chop 1/2 green pepper, 3 green onions, 6 mushrooms, and 1/2 zucchini into 1/4-inch pieces.

steps.title: Prepare Eggs
details: Scramble 2 eggs in a separate pan until cooked through.

steps.title: Grill Vegetables and Eggs
details: Once rice is cooked, place vegetables, 1 tablespoon butter, and scrambled eggs in a wok or large pan.
Grill for 5 minutes over medium-high heat, stirring constantly.

steps.title: Fry Rice
details: Add cooked rice to the wok with vegetables and eggs.
Add remaining 1 tablespoon butter and stir well.
Cook for 5 minutes over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally.

steps.title: Stir in Soy Sauce
details: Add 1/4 cup soy sauce to the fried rice and stir until evenly mixed.

steps.title: Serve Yourselves
details: Serve the fried rice hot in bowls.
Tip: Provide extra soy sauce for those who prefer a stronger flavor.
